page.title: 09Health Centre Collingham
page.content: In 1981 a new health centre was opened.Registered with the centre are {5,500 patients }who come from Collingham and the surrounding villages.The 4 doctors in attendance usually see 120 patients a day,working on a rota system and taking it in turns to be on call every week and at weekends.The practice is so busy that it also merits the assistance of 3 nurses a midwife and 2 health visitors.For the convenience of patients the centre contains its own {pharmacy },children up to school leaving age and old age pensioners having free prescriptions.Other patients pay{Â£2 }per item on each prescription.In the centre is a child care clinic,a well woman and a well man clinic.There are also facilities for physiotherapy,hearing assessment and for people who would like to slim.
